item.title: Korean Ground Beef
item.description: by Unknown Ingredients Yields ~4 servings (or 1 very hungry person) Ingredient Amount Lean Ground Beef 1 lb / 454 g Brown Sugar 1/2 Cup Sesame Oil 1 tsp Soy Sauce 1/2 Cup Minced Garlic 3 cloves Sriracha 1 tsp Fresh, Minced Ginger 1 tsp Green Onions 2 Preparation ~20 minutes Heat a large pan over medium - high heat. Brown meat with sesame oil, garlic, and ginger. Drain 75% of the fat, add in the brown sugar, soy sauce, and sriracha.
